title: Trump asks SCOTUS to end deportation protections for Venezuelans
shortDescription: The Trump administration wants to end a program that allows some Venezuelans to live and work temporarily in the United States.

title: Trump to add $100,000 fee for H-1B worker visas
shortDescription: The president intends to limit use of H-1B visas, which allow skilled laborers from other countries to work in the US.

title: Trump wants Supreme Court to get involved in passports for transgender people
shortDescription: The Trump administration does not want to issue passports to transgender and nonbinary Americans that reflect their gender identities.

title: Gold statue of Donald Trump holding a Bitcoin went up in DC. Why?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump had a statue honoring him put up near the US Capitol, but it was only temporary to honor his cryptocurrency support.

title: Kayleigh McEnany talks new Fox show, Trump, Kirk and Karoline
shortDescription: Former Trump Press Secretary Kayleigh McEnany hosts a new Fox News show. Now, she's talking about the past, Charlie Kirk and Karoline Leavitt.

title: Trumpâ€™s $15B NYT lawsuit dismissed
shortDescription: A federal judge dismissed President Donald Trump's $15B lawsuit against the New York Times, calling it legally baseless.

title: Trump suggests TikTok deal approved by China, but details unclear
shortDescription: President Trump thanked China's Xi Jinping for "the TikTok approval" after a Friday phone call, while Xi signaled support for the "solution."

title: Senate votes against funding bill, teeing up shutdown
shortDescription: Hours after the House passed a bill to keep the government open past Sept. 30, the Senate voted it down.

title: Judge throws out Trump's $15 billion lawsuit against New York Times
shortDescription: A federal judge rejected President Donald Trump's $15 billion lawsuit against the New York Times for not being a short, plain statement of complaint.

title: Kimmel's reaction to Trump's election foreshadowed 'host round up'
shortDescription: When Donald Trump was re-elected in 2024, Jimmy Kimmel was emotional on his show. He joked about jail, but braced for 'great talk show host round up.'

title: Man accused in Trump assassination attempt to present his case
shortDescription: Ryan Routh, the man accused of plotting to kill President Donald Trump last year, is expected to present his case to the jury.

title: Trump designates antifa a terror organization
shortDescription: President Trump just made it official. He's designating antifa a terrorist organization.

title: Trump to attend Charlie Kirk memorial. Here's what to know.
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is set to appear at the Charlie Kirk memorial in Arizona on Sept. 21. Here's what to know.

title: Trump wants to designate antifa as a terrorist group. What is it?
shortDescription: Experts question how Trump will accomplish this, saying antifa is more of a concept than an organization with a headquarters and leadership structure.
